channel.title: Future on norbu09
channel.description: Recent content in Future on norbu09

item.title: The chilling effect of tech law
item.description: Two years ago I was part of a bunch of people who put in a submission on the Telecommunications (Interception Capability and Security) Bill. Dave wrote about it here: http://dave.moskovitz.co.nz/2013/08/13/tics-bill-submission/. Juha Saarinen posted this article on the Herald and it is really not helping to turn around and say “we told you so”, what we actually need is politicians to get off their arrogant attitude and actually listen to the tech community.
